attributes.action: Top Gear was the only reason to pay the license fee, abolish the fee for those who don't want to watch the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
For many there was only one reason to watch the BBC and that was Top Gear, weather you think this is a worthy petition or not it is a fact that is supported by many in the UK and around the world.

The BBC is not a worthwhile organisation for many and as such it is not just that all should be made to pay for something they do not take anything from.

Let the BBC start advertising and let it pay for itself like all the rest, then abolish the fee charged to us all.
